snippet: Whether polling firms conducted their surveys online or called cellphones made a big difference in predicting the election.
abstract: FiveThirtyEight blog analyzes way in which techniques that produce most accurate polls seem to be changing as Americans' modes of communication change, in light of number of polling firms that conduct their surveys online yielding accurate results.
lead_paragraph: Whether polling firms conducted their surveys online or called cellphones made a big difference in predicting the election.

headline.seo: The Techniques Behind the Most-Accurate Polls
headline.main: Google or Gallup? Changes in Voters’ Habits Reshape Polling World
headline.print_headline: Google or Gallup? Changes in Voters’ Habits Reshape Polling World
